mapper.sql: title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR press LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE nno = #{nno}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT rownum rnum, nno, url, press, title, content, write_date, hit, rep_cnt, like_cnt FROM( SELECT nno, url, press, title, content, write_date, hit, rep_cnt, like_cnt FROM news ORDER BY hit DESC ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT * FROM( SELECT rownum rnum, sno, search_cnt, word, search_date FROM ( SELECT sno, search_cnt, word, search_date FROM news_search ORDER BY search_cnt DESC ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news_search(sno, word) SELECT news_search_seq.nextval, #{word} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT word FROM news_search WHERE word = #{word})
mapper.update: UPDATE news_search SET search_cnt = search_cnt + 1 WHERE word = #{word}
